name: A Hemorrhage of Time
description:
They stayed out until it was late, enjoying the playground. This place always felt safer after dusk. But in the darkness, it becomes difficult to discern what is there and what is not. Could something could be both.

Use the arrow keys to make them move.

Press the C key to make them interact.

Press the Z key to make them run.

If you enjoyed this game be sure to rate it, recommend it to your friends or leave a comment on what your feedback is.
